text: Xiànzài, ān lā yǐ jiǎnqīng nǐmen de fùdān, yīnwèi tā zhīdào nǐmen shàng yǒuxiē bóruò, suǒyǐ, jiǎrú nǐmen zhōng yǒu yībǎi gè jiānrěn zhě [zhù], tāmen jiāng néng zhànshèng èrbǎi rén; jiǎrú nǐmen zhōng yǒu yīqiān rén, tāmen fèng'ān lā zhī mìng jiāng néng zhànshèng èrqiān rén. Ān lā yǔ jiānrěn zhě tóng zài.
